resources.string:
Corona virus disease(COVID-19) is a new strain 
that was discovered in 2019 and has not been 
previously identified in humans. Reported 
illnesses have ranged from mild symptoms to severe illness and death for confirmed
corona virus diseases 2019(COVID-19) cases.

CoronaVsSL is a app that collects the recent data about the pandemic corona virus and provides the useful information to the user dynamically. I made a use of an api to fetch the stats about corona on different nations of the world.
